name: Scatterdust
description: You target a point you can see within a moderate (20 unit) range and cause tiny motes of colors to fall from the sky within a 3 unit radius centered on that point for the next minute. Creatures that start their turn within the dust must make a concentration check of 8 or become confused. If a confused creature starts their turn within the area, they take 6 psychic damage.
charge: Creatures with any mental condition who start their turn in the area take the psychic damage, which is upgraded to 10 damage.
